name: Helicopter Master
description:
Great helicopter game!

Fly in the sky and fight against opponents.

You are an army pilot, you have a combat helicopter at your disposal. Patrol from the sky, 

shoot down unidentified and enemy helicopters.

Shoot enemies from your arsenal and do not let knock yourself out!

The game requires attention and reaction, you need to quickly knock out the enemy until he knocked you out.

Collect bonuses, develop your helicopter, complete levels.

Try to win all levels!
